dct_title_s: A new map of Spain and Portugal, exhibiting the chains of mountains with their passes the principal & cross roads, with other detail requisite for the intelligence of military operations
dct_description_sm: With an explanatory "advertisement" giving the sources of the map detail and a table setting out distances between major towns.
dct_publisher_sm: Published by W. Faden,  Geographer to His Majesty and to His Royal Highness the Prince of Wales,  Charing Cross (London)
